H0.text: The fossils changed locations, which explains why several seaâ€‘organism fossils were discovered buried deep in an area of dry land.

H1.text: The area had a shift in climate, which best explains why several fossils of sea organisms were discovered buried deep in an area of dry land.

H2.text: The land was once underwater, which explains why several fossils of sea organisms were discovered buried deep in an area of dry land.

H3.text: A glacier once covered the area, explaining why several fossils of sea organisms were discovered buried deep in an area of dry land.

A4.text: Coral, for example, only lives in warm and shallow marine environments and fossils of coral are thus typical for shallow marine facies.
